property.name: BEFORE_PRINT
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Document is printed. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_PRINT
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Document is printed. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_LINKS_CHANGED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after one or more links in the Document have been added, deleted, or modified. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_NEW
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Document is created. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_OPEN
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Document is opened. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_SAVE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Document is saved. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_SAVE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Document is saved. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_SAVE_AS
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Document is saved under a new name. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_SAVE_AS
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Document is saved under a new name. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_SAVE_A_COPY
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a copy of a Document is saved. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_SAVE_A_COPY
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a copy of a Document is saved. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_REVERT
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Document is reverted. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_REVERT
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Document is reverted. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_CLOSE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Document is closed. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_EXPORT
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Document is exported. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_EXPORT
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Document is exported. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: FAILED_EXPORT
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Document export is canceled or fails. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_IMPORT
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before importing a file into a Document. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_IMPORT
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after importing a file into a Document. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_DEACTIVATE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before the Document becomes inactive. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_ACTIVATE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after the Document becomes active. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: associatedXMLElement
property.shortdesc: The XML element associated with the Document.

property.name: exportForWebPreferences
property.shortdesc: The default export for web preferences.

property.name: versionState
property.shortdesc: The Version Cue version state of the file.

property.name: editingState
property.shortdesc: The Version Cue editing state of the file.

property.name: allParagraphStyles
property.shortdesc: Lists all paragraph styles (regardless of their group).

property.name: allCharacterStyles
property.shortdesc: Lists all character styles (regardless of their group).

property.name: textWrapPreferences
property.shortdesc: The text wrap preference properties that define the default formatting for wrapping text around objects.

property.name: indexGenerationOptions
property.shortdesc: The index options properties that define how an index is formatted.

property.name: allPageItems
property.shortdesc: Lists all page items contained by the Document.

property.name: allGraphics
property.shortdesc: Lists all graphics contained by the Document.

property.name: allObjectStyles
property.shortdesc: All object styles contained by the Document.

property.name: pageItemDefaults
property.shortdesc: The default page item formatting for the Document.

property.name: frameFittingOptions
property.shortdesc: The frame fitting option to apply to placed or pasted content. Can be applied to a frame, object style, or document or to the application.

property.name: fullName
property.shortdesc: The full path to the Document, including the name of the Document.

property.name: visible
property.shortdesc: If true, the Document is visible.

property.name: filePath
property.shortdesc: The full path to the file.

property.name: modified
property.shortdesc: If true, the Document has been modified since it was last saved.

property.name: saved
property.shortdesc: If true, the Document has been saved since it was created.

property.name: unusedSwatches
property.shortdesc: The swatches that are not being used.

property.name: converted
property.shortdesc: If true, the Document was converted.

property.name: recovered
property.shortdesc: If true, the Document was recovered.

property.name: readOnly
property.shortdesc: If true, the Document is read-only.

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: The unique ID of the Document.

property.name: cmykProfileList
property.shortdesc: A list of valid CMYK profiles.

property.name: rgbProfileList
property.shortdesc: A list of valid RGB profiles.

property.name: layoutGridData
property.shortdesc: Default properties specific to layout grids.

property.name: storyGridData
property.shortdesc: Default properties specific to frame grids.

property.name: undoName
property.shortdesc: The name of the action on the top of the undo stack.

property.name: redoName
property.shortdesc: The name of the action on the top of the redo stack.

property.name: undoHistory
property.shortdesc: The names of the items in the undo stack.

property.name: redoHistory
property.shortdesc: The names of the items in the redo stack.

property.name: activeProcess
property.shortdesc: The active preflight process for this document.

property.name: dataMergeProperties
property.shortdesc: Data merge properties that define data merge fields and preferences.

property.name: dataMergeOptions
property.shortdesc: The data merge option properties that define the data merge.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the Document (a Application).

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the Document within its containing object.

property.name: xmlExportMaps
property.shortdesc: A collection of XML export maps.

property.name: xmlImportMaps
property.shortdesc: A collection of XML import maps.

property.name: validationErrors
property.shortdesc: A collection of XML validation errors.

property.name: hyphenationExceptions
property.shortdesc: A collection of hyphenation exceptions lists.

property.name: paragraphStyleGroups
property.shortdesc: A collection of paragraph style groups.

property.name: characterStyleGroups
property.shortdesc: A collection of character style groups.

property.name: tableStyleGroups
property.shortdesc: A collection of table style groups.

property.name: cellStyleGroups
property.shortdesc: A collection of cell style groups.

property.name: dashedStrokeStyles
property.shortdesc: A collection of dashed stroke styles.

property.name: dottedStrokeStyles
property.shortdesc: A collection of dotted stroke styles.

property.name: stripedStrokeStyles
property.shortdesc: A collection of striped stroke styles.

property.name: pageItems
property.shortdesc: The page items collection, which can be used to process all page items in a container (such as a document, page, or group), regardless of type.

property.name: paraStyleMappings
property.shortdesc: A collection of para style mappings.

property.name: charStyleMappings
property.shortdesc: A collection of char style mappings.

property.name: tableStyleMappings
property.shortdesc: A collection of table style mappings.

property.name: cellStyleMappings
property.shortdesc: A collection of cell style mappings.

property.name: indexingSortOptions
property.shortdesc: A collection of indexing sort options.

property.name: hyperlinkPageItemSources
property.shortdesc: A collection of hyperlink page item sources.

property.name: hyperlinkTextSources
property.shortdesc: A collection of hyperlink text sources.

property.name: hyperlinkTextDestinations
property.shortdesc: A collection of hyperlink text destinations.

property.name: hyperlinkPageDestinations
property.shortdesc: A collection of hyperlink page destinations.

property.name: crossReferenceFormats
property.shortdesc: A collection of cross reference formats.

property.name: crossReferenceSources
property.shortdesc: A collection of cross reference text sources.

property.name: hyperlinkExternalPageDestinations
property.shortdesc: A collection of hyperlink external page destinations.

property.name: hyperlinkURLDestinations
property.shortdesc: A collection of hyperlink URL destinations.

property.name: objectStyleGroups
property.shortdesc: A collection of object style groups.

property.name: mixedInkGroups
property.shortdesc: A collection of mixed ink groups.

property.name: conditions
property.shortdesc: A collection of conditions for conditional text.

property.name: conditionSets
property.shortdesc: A collection of condition sets for conditional text.

property.name: dataMergeTextPlaceholders
property.shortdesc: A collection of data merge text placeholders.

property.name: dataMergeImagePlaceholders
property.shortdesc: A collection of data merge image placeholders.

property.name: zeroPoint
property.shortdesc: The ruler origin, specified as page coordinates in the format [x, y].

property.name: label
property.shortdesc: A property that can be set to any string.

property.name: activeLayer
property.shortdesc: The active layer. Can also accept: String.

property.name: solidColorIntent
property.shortdesc: The rendering intent for all vector art (areas of solid color) in native objects.

property.name: afterBlendingIntent
property.shortdesc: The rendering intent for colors that result from transparency interactions on the page after blending.

property.name: defaultImageIntent
property.shortdesc: The rendering intent for bitmap images.

property.name: rgbPolicy
property.shortdesc: The policy for handling colors in an RGB color model, including reading and embedding color profiles, handling mismatches between embedded color profiles and the working space, and moving colors from one document to another.

property.name: cmykPolicy
property.shortdesc: The policy for handling colors in a CMYK color model, including reading and embedding color profiles, mismatches between embedded color profiles and the working space, and moving colors from one document to another.

property.name: accurateLABSpots
property.shortdesc: If true, uses LAB alternates for spot colors when available.

property.name: selection
property.shortdesc: The selected object(s). Can also accept: Object or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: selectionKeyObject
property.shortdesc: The key object of the selection. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: mapStylesToXMLTags
method.shortdesc: Auto tag the document based on the style to tag mappings

method.name: mapXMLTagsToStyles
method.shortdesc: Auto style the document based on the tag to style mappings

method.name: importDtd
method.shortdesc: Imports a DTD to use for validation.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The path to the DTD file.

method.name: importXML
method.shortdesc: Imports the specified XML file into an InDesign document.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The XML file.

method.name: deleteUnusedTags
method.shortdesc: Deletes unused XML markup tags.

method.name: loadXMLTags
method.shortdesc: Loads a set of XML markup tags from the specified file.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The path to the file that contains the tags.

method.name: saveXMLTags
method.shortdesc: Saves a set of tags to an external file.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The full path to the file in which to save the tags.

parameters.name: versionComments
parameters.shortdesc: The comment for this version. (Optional)

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.shortdesc: If true, forcibly saves a version. (Optional)

method.name: changeComposer
method.shortdesc: Change comoser to optyca

method.name: revertToProject
method.shortdesc: Reverts to the version of the document in Version Cue.

parameters.name: forceRevert
parameters.shortdesc: Forcibly reverts to the project version. (Optional)

method.name: synchronizeWithVersionCue
method.shortdesc: Synchronizes the file with the Version Cue project.

parameters.name: syncConflictResolution
parameters.shortdesc: The conflict resolution method to use during synchronization. (Optional)

parameters.name: versionComments
parameters.shortdesc: The comments that describe the version. (Optional)

method.name: checkIn
method.shortdesc: Check in to Version Cue.

parameters.name: versionComments
parameters.shortdesc: The comment for this version (Optional)

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.shortdesc: Forcibly save a version (Optional)

method.name: createTOC
method.shortdesc: Creates a table of contents.

parameters.name: using
parameters.shortdesc: The TOC style to use to define the content, title, and format of the table of contents.

parameters.name: replacing
parameters.shortdesc: If true, replaces the existing TOC. (Optional)

parameters.name: fromBook
parameters.shortdesc: The book whose documents to include in the TOC. (Optional)

parameters.name: placePoint
parameters.shortdesc: The point at which to place the TOC story, specified as page coordinates in the format [x, y]. (Optional)

parameters.name: includeOverset
parameters.shortdesc: If true, includes overset text TOC entries in the TOC. (Optional)

parameters.name: destinationLayer
parameters.shortdesc: The layer on which to place the TOC. (Optional)

method.name: importStyles
method.shortdesc: Imports the specified styles.

parameters.name: format
parameters.shortdesc: The types of styles to import.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The file containing the styles you want to import.

parameters.name: globalStrategy
parameters.shortdesc: The resolution strategy to employ for imported styles that have the same names as existing styles. (Optional)

method.name: recompose
method.shortdesc: Recomposes the text in the Document.

method.name: exportStrokeStyles
method.shortdesc: Exports stroke styles or presets.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The file to save to

parameters.name: strokeStyleList
parameters.shortdesc: The list of stroke styles to save

parameters.name: versionComments
parameters.shortdesc: The comment for this version (Optional)

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.shortdesc: Forcibly save a version (Optional)

method.name: findText
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

method.name: changeText
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value and replaces the text with the change to value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

method.name: findGrep
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

method.name: changeGrep
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value and replaces the text with the change to value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

method.name: findGlyph
method.shortdesc: Finds glyphs that match the find what value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

method.name: changeGlyph
method.shortdesc: Finds glyphs that match the find what value and replaces the glyphs with the change to value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

method.name: findObject
method.shortdesc: Finds objects that match the find what value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

method.name: changeObject
method.shortdesc: Finds objects that match the find what value and replace the objects with the change to value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

method.name: findTransliterate
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find character type value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

method.name: changeTransliterate
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find character type value and replaces the text with the change character type value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

method.name: placeAndLink
method.shortdesc: Deprecated: Use ContentPlacerObject load method. Original Description: Place following the behavior of the place and link story menu item. This will load the place gun.

parameters.name: parentStory
parameters.shortdesc: The story to place and link from.

parameters.name: showingOptions
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to display the link options dialog (Optional)

method.name: print
method.shortdesc: Prints the Document(s).

parameters.name: printDialog
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to invoke the print dialog (Optional)

parameters.name: using
parameters.shortdesc: Printer preset to use. Can accept: PrinterPresetTypes enumerator or PrinterPreset. (Optional)

method.name: printBooklet
method.shortdesc: Print the Booklet using current document and Booklet and Print settings in the document

parameters.name: printBookletDialog
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to invoke the print booklet dialog (Optional)

parameters.name: using
parameters.shortdesc: Printer preset to use. Can accept: PrinterPresetTypes enumerator or PrinterPreset. (Optional)

method.name: place
method.shortdesc: Place one or more files following the behavior of the place menu item. This may load the place gun or replace the selected object, depending on current preferences.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.shortdesc: One or more files to place. Can accept: File or Array of Files.

parameters.name: showingOptions
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to display the import options dialog (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the placed object(s) (Optional)

method.name: loadMasters
method.shortdesc: Load masterpages from an InDesign file.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The InDesign file to load the masters from.

parameters.name: globalStrategyForMasterPage
parameters.shortdesc: the global clash resolution strategy for load master page (Optional)

method.name: createAlternateLayout
method.shortdesc: Creates an alternate layout for a given list of spreads.

parameters.name: spreadItems
parameters.shortdesc: The spreads to create an alternate layout for.

parameters.name: name
parameters.shortdesc: The name of the alternate layout. Note: This is used for the named layout for the new section for the duplicated spreads.

parameters.name: width
parameters.shortdesc: The width of the pages created.

parameters.name: height
parameters.shortdesc: The height of the pages created.

parameters.name: createTextStyles
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to create new text styles.

parameters.name: linkTextStories
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to create linked text for duplicated text stories.

parameters.name: layoutRule
parameters.shortdesc: What layout rule to set on the pages.

method.name: deleteAlternateLayout
method.shortdesc: Deletes an alternate layout.

parameters.name: name
parameters.shortdesc: The name of the alternate layout to delete.

method.name: importFormats
method.shortdesc: Imports the cross reference formats from specified file.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The file whose formats to import.

method.name: updateCrossReferences
method.shortdesc: Updates cross references' text source content in the document.

method.name: align
method.shortdesc: Align page items.

parameters.name: alignDistributeItems
parameters.shortdesc: The page items to align or distribute.

parameters.name: alignOption
parameters.shortdesc: The type of alignment to apply.

parameters.name: alignDistributeBounds
parameters.shortdesc: The bounds within which to align or distribute the page items. (Optional)

parameters.name: reference
parameters.shortdesc: The reference or key object to align to distribute relative to. Required when 'align distribute bounds' specifies 'key object'. (Optional)

method.name: distribute
method.shortdesc: Distribute page items.

parameters.name: alignDistributeItems
parameters.shortdesc: The page items to align or distribute

parameters.name: distributeOption
parameters.shortdesc: The type of distribution to apply.

parameters.name: alignDistributeBounds
parameters.shortdesc: The bounds within which to align or distribute the page items. (Optional)

parameters.name: useDistributeMeasurement
parameters.shortdesc: If true, distribute space between page items. When this property is true, the bounds setting is ignored. (Optional)

parameters.name: absoluteDistributeMeasurement
parameters.shortdesc: The distance to use when distributing page items. Required when 'align distribute bounds' specifies 'key object'. (Optional)

parameters.name: reference
parameters.shortdesc: The reference or key object to align to distribute relative to. Required when 'align distribute bounds' specifies 'key object'. (Optional)

method.name: clearFrameFittingOptions
method.shortdesc: Removes the frame fittings options and resets it to the initial state.

method.name: resetAllMultiStateObjects
method.shortdesc: Resets all the multi-state objects to their first state.

method.name: resetAllButtons
method.shortdesc: Resets all the buttons to their Normal state.

method.name: exportFile
method.shortdesc: Exports the object(s) to a file.

parameters.name: format
parameters.shortdesc: The export format, specified as an enumeration value or as an extension that appears in the Save as type or Format menu in the Export dialog. Can accept: ExportFormat enumerator or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The path to the export file.

parameters.name: showingOptions
parameters.shortdesc: If true, displays the export options dialog. (Optional)

parameters.name: using
parameters.shortdesc: The export style. (Optional)

parameters.name: versionComments
parameters.shortdesc: The comment for this version. (Optional)

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.shortdesc: If true, forcibly saves a version. (Optional)

method.name: asynchronousExportFile
method.shortdesc: asynchronously exports the object(s) to a file.

parameters.name: format
parameters.shortdesc: The export format, specified as an enumeration value or as an extension that appears in the Save as type or Format menu in the Export dialog. Can accept: ExportFormat enumerator or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The path to the export file.

parameters.name: showingOptions
parameters.shortdesc: If true, displays the export options dialog. (Optional)

parameters.name: using
parameters.shortdesc: The export style. (Optional)

parameters.name: versionComments
parameters.shortdesc: The comment for this version. (Optional)

parameters.name: forceSave

method.name: revert
method.shortdesc: Reverts the document to its state at the last save operation.

method.name: saveACopy
method.shortdesc: Saves a copy of the document.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The file path for the copy. Note: Leaves the original document open and does not open the copy. (Optional)

parameters.name: stationery
parameters.shortdesc: If true, saves the file as stationery (Mac OS) or as a template (Windows). Note: The file extension for stationery and templates is different than the extension for regular files. (Optional)

method.name: loadConditions
method.shortdesc: Load conditions from the specified file.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The path to the file that contains the conditions.

parameters.name: loadConditionSets
parameters.shortdesc: If true, load the condition sets as well. (Optional)

method.name: select
method.shortdesc: Selects the specified object(s).

parameters.name: selectableItems
parameters.shortdesc: The objects to select. Can accept: Object, Array of Objects, NothingEnum enumerator or SelectAll enumerator.

parameters.name: existingSelection
parameters.shortdesc: The selection status of the Document in relation to previously selected objects. (Optional)

method.name: undo
method.shortdesc: Undoes the last action.

method.name: redo
method.shortdesc: Redoes the last action.

method.name: packageForPrint
method.shortdesc: Packages the document.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The folder, alias, or path in which to place the packaged files.

parameters.name: copyingFonts
parameters.shortdesc: If true, copies fonts used in the document to the package folder.

parameters.name: copyingLinkedGraphics
parameters.shortdesc: If true, copies linked graphics files to the package folder.

parameters.name: copyingProfiles
parameters.shortdesc: If true, copies color profiles to the package folder.

parameters.name: updatingGraphics
parameters.shortdesc: If true, updates graphics links to the package folder.

parameters.name: includingHiddenLayers
parameters.shortdesc: If true, copies fonts and links from hidden layers to the package.

parameters.name: ignorePreflightErrors
parameters.shortdesc: If true, ignores preflight errors and proceeds with the packaging. If false, cancels the packaging when errors exist.

parameters.name: creatingReport
parameters.shortdesc: If true, creates a package report that includes printing instructions, print settings, lists of fonts, links and required inks, and other information.

parameters.name: versionComments
parameters.shortdesc: The comments for the version. (Optional)

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.shortdesc: If true, forcibly saves a version. (Optional)

method.name: embed
method.shortdesc: Embed this profile to the document.

parameters.name: using
parameters.shortdesc: The preflight profile to embed. Can accept: String or PreflightProfile.

method.name: getAlternateLayoutsForFolio
method.shortdesc: This will return an array of structs containing information about the alternate layouts.

parameters.name: resolveMaster
parameters.shortdesc: Resolves layout policy if setting is "use master" - default is true. (Optional)

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Document.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

method.name: toSpecifier
method.shortdesc: Retrieves the object specifier.

method.name: addEventListener
method.shortdesc: Adds an event listener.

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.shortdesc: The event type.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: captures
parameters.shortdesc: This parameter is obsolete. (Optional)

method.name: removeEventListener
method.shortdesc: Removes the event listener.

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event type.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: captures
parameters.shortdesc: This parameter is obsolete. (Optional)
